content.question: Which of the following is best supported by the passage?

choices.label: The Spanish government used agents of the Inquisition as ambassadors to neighboring countries.
Barcelona was the center of Protestant activity in Spain.
The Spanish government was producing religious treatises for the Catholic Reformation and sending them abroad.
Owning and reading Protestant religious literature was illegal in Spain.

content.answer: Owning and reading Protestant religious literature was illegal in Spain.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
